name: Grenadate: Fire in The Heart
description:
GrenaDate: Fire in The Heart, is a visual novel game made to commemorate the 1 year anniversary of Nijisanji ID 5th wave, 53Renade. The game was developed by the fans (Grenades) as a gift to Reza Avanluna, Derem Kado and Nagisa Arcinia for all the happiness they have brought to our lives over the past year.

[Developer's notes]

[1 EN] This game is using free to use assets we found in some sources and also some stuffs we made by ourselves.

[1 ID] Game ini menggunakan aset-aset yang dapat bebas digunakan yang kami temukan dari beberapa sumber dan juga ada bagian-bagian yang kami buat sendiri.

[2 EN] Before you play this game publicly, we suggest you to try to saving the game in an empty slot and do overwrite save to avoid possible error.

[2 ID] Sebelum memainkan game ini secara publik, disarankan untuk mencoba save di slot kosong dan overwrite save terlebih dulu untuk menghindari terjadinya kesalahan.

[3 EN] In the folder after you downloaded it, there'll be 2 type of files. The file with "32" was made for OS 32 bit and so on.

[3 ID] Di dalam folder setelah diunduh akan ada 2 tipe file. File dengan imbuhan 32 dibuat untuk pengguna OS 32 bit dan seterusnya.

Other developer's notes are listed in the twitter account (www.twitter.com/Grenade53_2434).

Have fun playing, Grenades!
